entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
